DataElement.preferredName: Human Cancer Models Initiative Participant Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The unique identification for a participant using the HCM letter center code and number model code.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Human Cancer Models Initiative Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity._A collaboration between the National Cancer Institute, Cancer Research UK, the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute, and the foundation Hubrecht Organoid Technology to generate new models of cancer that more accurately represent human tumors than existing cell line models._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
